title: Shuttle Art 87 Pack Acrylic Paints Set, Canvas Painting Set with 3 Pack of 15 Colours Acrylic Paint, 3 Sets of Wooden Easels, Canvas, Brushes & Palettes, Acrylic Paint Sets for Adults Kids Beginner
features: COMPLETE BEGINNER-FRIENDLY SET: Acrylic paint set includes 3 sets of 15 colours acrylic paint (12 ml tubes) and 3 wooden easels, 3 sets of paint brushes (10 of each), 3 rectangular canvases (20cmx25cm), 3 round canvases (20cmx20cm) and 3 mixing palettes. Get painting set and start painting. Canvas and paint set suit paint nights with friends or family gatherings or class art activities.

VIBRANT Colours & CREAMY SMOOTH BLENDING: Acrylic paints bring vibrant colours, thick and creamy texture, as well as incredible consistency. Painting kit suit kids activities or parties, keeping children entertained and engaged in creative activities. Paint kit is ideal for kids painting birthday decorations or adults crafting detailed holiday greeting cards.

SPACE-SAVING FOLDABLE EASELS: Table top easel is sturdy and foldable, easy to carry. Wooden easels can be used for table top painting, also display stand for painting or pad. You can use it in a pop-up art station at festivals or sketch during camping trips.

MULTI-GROUP FUN ACTIVITY: Three easels and 30 brushes let multiple people create together. Sip and paint kit is ideal for family activities, parties, date night, group projects and more. Painting canvas set allows you to enjoy the joy of painting with family, friends and loved ones.

GIFT-READY PACKAGING: Comprehensive paint set with beautiful package creates unboxing magic. Art set is a Christmas surprise or birthday gift for kids, adults, beginners and artist. If you are not satisfied with our products or have any questions, please feel free to contact us at any time.
